ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A dentist specializing in the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of malocclusions of the teeth and their surrounding structures.

Concepts.definition: A dentist specializing in the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of malocclusions of the teeth and their surrounding structures.

Property.preferredName: Dental Fix Maxilla Retainer Device Component Without End Recommendation
Property.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.:Cause to be firmly attached; stick or hold together and resist separation.:The upper jawbone in vertebrates: it is fused to the cranium.:A physical device designed to hold something in place.:Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone. (from Merriam-Webster OnLine):The point or place at which something terminates in time, space, or extent.:Recommendation; advice telling someone what the best thing to do is.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.
Cause to be firmly attached; stick or hold together and resist separation.
The upper jawbone in vertebrates; it is fused to the cranium.
A physical device designed to hold something in place.
Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone.
The point or place at which something terminates in time, space, or extent.
Advice telling someone what the best thing to do is.
